items.name: Baller
items.desc:
Baller is an IPA. We took everything we’ve learnt about making IPAs and put it into this beer. Lots of hops, big bright flavours, smooth body. It’s our go-to IPA.
Goes well with big livin and splashing out.

items.name: Bandit
items.desc:
A Gluten Free Pale Ale. We took our beloved Beatnik and stole the gluten out. It’s a light, refreshing pale. Still fruity, still floral. Loads of flavour, just gluten free.
Goes well with high revs and breeze in your hair.
This is Sam. He’s a Gipsy Hill co-founder. He likes long and windy roads.
This beer is brewed used products containing gluten – we use a natural enzyme to break down the gluten chains leaving the product with less than 20ppm of gluten.

items.name: Blisco Dash
items.desc:
This is Blisco Dash – A Kveik Pale Ale.
Our favourite Voss yeast strain has been cranking esters through ramped fermentation and cast out temps.
On top of that it’s been loaded with classic Cascade and Hallertau Blanc & Melon hotside for full on pine, floral and sweet-fruit top notes, before being blasted with Idaho 7 in the dry-hop for that tropical kick.
Goes well with getting lost and sweet fresh air.
Featuring Sarah, Gipsy Hill’s finance guru and speed demon.

items.name: Buy The NHS A Pint: New England IPA
items.desc:
This is Buy The NHS A Pint: New England-style IPA. This time we led with fruity German varieties (Mandarina Bavaria, Hull Melon & Blanc), mixed in with Mosaic and Ekuanot. It’s been fermented on our house yeast for big sticky esters, and finishes rich with a lot of nuanced, balanced flavours.
To support our NHS heroes on the frontlines of the fight against Coronavirus, we started a pay-it-forward scheme to raise money for NHS workers to enjoy well-earned drink. All money raised will be put on as a bar tab redeemable by NHS staff after lockdown. By buying this beer, you’re supporting the cause. See www.buytheNHSapint.com for more details.

items.name: Buy The NHS A Pint: Pilsner
items.desc:
This is Buy The NHS A Pint: Session Pilsner. It’s got a clean grist, traditional yeast, and new and old school German hops of Hersbrucker and Mandarina Bavaria. It’s clean, easy and full of flavour.
To support our NHS heroes on the frontlines of the fight against Coronavirus, we started a pay-it-forward scheme to raise money for NHS workers to enjoy well-earned drink. All money raised will be put on as a bar tab redeemable by NHS staff after lockdown. By buying this beer, you’re supporting the cause. See www.buytheNHSapint.com for more details.

items.name: Buy The NHS A Pint: Table Beer
items.desc:
This is our Buy The NHS A Pint: Table Beer. Hit with Cashmere, Azacca and Mosaic in the dry hop, it’s got a lot of flavour and clean, refreshing balance.
To support our NHS heroes on the frontlines of the fight against Coronavirus, we started a pay-it-forward scheme to raise money for NHS workers to enjoy a well-earned drink. All money raised will be put on as a bar tab redeemable by NHS staff after lockdown. By buying this beer, you’re supporting the cause.

items.name: Buy The NHS A Pint: West Coast IPA
items.desc:
This is our Buy The NHS A Pint: West Coast-style IPA. It’s hopped up with Amarillo, Simcoe and some big C hops (Cascade, Centennial and Columbus) for maximum old school IPA (bitter, resinous and piney), mixed with modern notes (softer, fruity and delicate)
To support our NHS heroes on the frontlines of the fight against Coronavirus, we started a pay-it-forward scheme to raise money for NHS workers to enjoy a well-earned drink. All money raised will be put on as a bar tab redeemable by NHS
staff after lockdown. By buying this beer, you’re supporting the cause.

items.name: Carver
items.desc:
A Micro IPA. We took everything we love about IPAs and brought down the ABV. It’s hoppy, it’s got body, it’s got balance, tropical aromas and a smooth, juicy taste.
Goes well with bright mornings and open roads.
This is Alice. She’s our Sales Whizz. She likes far-flung adventures.

items.name: Dinomania
items.desc:
This is Dinomania – A West Coast Pilsner.
It’s got the classic Pilsner cleanliness and bitterness, combined with old school Mosaic to give wonderful balance, and fruity top notes, with an undeniably full-flavoured lager running through it.
Goes well with Crystal Palaces and wild dinosaurs.

items.name: Grafter
items.desc:
This is Grafter – a Micro Kveik IPA
It’s got big, bold hop notes from Galaxy and Summer, followed dup with lashings of El Dorado. The Voss yeast brings out stone fruits to match, with a low ABV finish.
Goes well with speciality foods and the gift of the gab.

items.name: Hepcat
items.desc:
This is Hepcat. A Session IPA. Our mainstay and our original. It’s everything the style should be – fruity nose, juicy body, bright taste. Can we humbly call it a classic?
Goes well with dancefloors and smooth moves.
This is Marcus. He’s our designer, illustrator and friend. He likes expensive jackets and colouring in.

items.name: Hitcher
items.desc:
This is Hitcher – An American Pale Ale
A clean grist and a classic yeast means this beer harks back to what most of us fell in love with the first time.
A big whirlpool dose of Simcoe and Amarillo, with Simco cyro and Amarillo in the dry hop, gives you dank pine and sweet tangerine.
Goes well with yellows, oranges, reds and purples.
Featuring Ciaran, our production chief and cycling savant.

items.name: Hunter
items.desc:
An uncompromised lager. All premium malts. All noble hops. Conditioned for 40 days. Unfiltered. Light bitterness, spicy, bready and moreish.
Goes well with swells and big breaks.
This is Simon. Our Head Brewer. He likes beaches and wild, windy days.

items.name: Moneybags
items.desc:
This is Moneybags – Double IPA.
A big, thick and juicy DIPA. Pumped full of Citra and Mosaic, and fermented with a Kveik yeast strain to really bring out those big pineapple and mango flavours.
Goes well with big bills and deep pockets.

items.name: Naturalist
items.desc:
This is Naturalist – A New England-style IPA.
Using our house yeast that specialises in stone fruit esters, this beer’s got big thick body and tropical vibe top notes.
Azacca hops in the whirlpool and a hugo Bru-1, Ekuanot and Sabro combo in the dry hop give it a fruity swagger.
Goes well with thick trunks and deep roots.
Featuring AJ, boundless optimist and brew-crew stalwart.

items.name: Operator
items.desc:
This is Operator – A New England IPA.
Boatloads of new kid Strata leads with huge passions fruit aromas, balanced out by classic Azacca and Ekuanot hops. It’s all pulled in by our house Vermont yeast for big, full flavour.
Goes well with power stations and expensive conversions.

items.name: Outdoorsman
items.desc:
This is Outdoorsman – A Triple Fruited Sour.
A classic Gipsy Hill sour base beer, with lashings of blueberry and just a hint of banana thrown in. It’s balanced and sweet, with so much fruity flavour that it must count as one of your five a day (It probably doesn’t).
Goes well with narrow, winding country lanes.
Featuring Terry, Gipsy Hill salesman and South London legend.

items.name: Outlooker
items.desc:
This is Outlooker
A Triple Fruited Sour, soured on our house lactobacillus culture, and charged with 200g/l of our favourite berry purées. It’s an out-of-this-world smoothie of a beer.
Goes well with night skies and Northern Lights.
Featuring Connor, warehouse mover and shaker.

items.name: Propeller
items.desc:
This is Propeller – A Rye Saison.
It’s been woven with rye, to sow a complex, peppery aroma, balanced with the cloves and spices from the traditional Saison yeast. It’s been gently hopped to complement the dry finish.
Goes well with milled grains and Brixton landmarks.

items.name: Ranger
items.desc:
A Pale Ale. Best quality malts. Batch selected hops. It’s clean, balanced, and zesty beer with piney, citrus and stone-fruit notes.
Goes well with open space and hearty meals.
This is Josh. He’s a production wunderkid. He likes home comforts and the great outdoors.
